summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Dallas City Council will hold a Budget Workshop on August 13, 2024, at 9:00 AM in the Council Chambers, City Hall. This meeting will be conducted both in-person and via videoconference, allowing public participation. The primary purpose is to discuss the City Manager’s recommended budget for fiscal years 2024-25 and 2025-26.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The main focus of the workshop is the presentation of the City Manager’s budget recommendations. This will include a detailed overview of proposed allocations and financial strategies for the upcoming fiscal years.

**Important Details**:  
The workshop will feature a presentation that outlines the budget, highlighting significant proposals, potential budget adjustments, and any policy changes that may impact city services. The Council may also discuss the implications of these budgetary decisions on various city projects and initiatives.

**Action Items**:  
The City Council will seek preliminary feedback and expressions of preference regarding the budget recommendations. While no formal votes are expected during this workshop, the discussions will inform future decisions and approvals related to the budget. Public input will be encouraged, and citizens wishing to speak must register in advance with the City Secretary’s Office. 

Overall, this meeting is crucial for shaping the financial direction of the City of Dallas for the next two years.
